Hero.title: Horizon Security & Protection
Hero.subTitle: Horizon Security and Protection provides leading security guard services, CCTV monitoring, and consultancy for public and private facilities in Jordan.

AboutUs.title: About us
AboutUs.textFirst: Horizon Security and Protection is a trusted private security company in Jordan. We specialize in delivering comprehensive security services, including armed and unarmed security guards, CCTV monitoring, and expert consultancy. Our tailored security solutions serve public, private, and industrial sectors, ensuring top-tier protection for any facility.
AboutUs.textSecond: Our team of professionals is equipped with the latest technology and training to guarantee the safety of your property and people. Contact us today to experience the best security services in Jordan.

securityEquipment.title: Security Equipment
securityEquipment.text: We supply security equipment and provide ​training in its usage and handling.

siteSecurity.title: Site Security
siteSecurity.text: Our site security services cover ​construction sites, temporary projects, ​and special events.

armedUnarmed.title: Armed and Unarmed Security
armedUnarmed.text: We provide armed and unarmed security and ​protection services for all facilities and ​sites.

securityPlan.title: Security Plan Preparation
securityPlan.text: We prepare security plans, including ​evacuation plans for facilities, and offer ​training on their implementation after ​comprehensive site assessments.

securityConsultancy.title: Security Consultancy
securityConsultancy.text: Our consultancy services cater to various ​sites, including facilities, buildings, ​towers, and both profit and non-profit ​institutions.

securityTechnology.title: Tech. and Security Solutions
securityTechnology.text: We offer advanced technology and security ​solutions to meet diverse needs.

securityQualified.title: Qualified Security Personnel
securityQualified.text: We supply security personnel trained in using ​a range of security devices, including ​explosive and traditional weapons detection, ​CCTV surveillance, and tracking devices.

securityControl.title: Control Room Management
securityControl.text: We manage control rooms, provide camera ​surveillance, and handle alarm systems ​with qualified and trained personnel.

experiencedPersonnel.title: Expertise & Experience
experiencedPersonnel.text: With over 20 years of experience in the security industry, Horizon Security and Protection has established itself as one of the top security companies in Jordan. Our expertise spans across multiple industries, from hospitality to large industrial complexes.

stateOfArt.title: Tailored Security Solutions
stateOfArt.text: We offer customized security services based on your specific needs, including residential, corporate, and event security. Every client receives a bespoke security plan designed for their exact requirements.

qualifiedLeadership.title: Qualified Security Professionals:
qualifiedLeadership.text: Our highly trained security guards and consultants ensure the highest standards of safety, equipped with the latest technology to safeguard your business or property.

training.title: Training
training.subTitle: Horizon Security and Protection employees undergo various training courses to ensure ​they perform their duties efficiently and effectively. Key training courses include:
training.trainingsNote: These training courses can be customized to meet the specific needs of the workplace.
trainingsList: Basic Security and Protection: Covers fundamental security concepts, risk identification, safety ​procedures, evacuation, and self-defense techniques.
Comprehensive Inspection: Training on thorough inspection procedures for individuals and vehicles to ​ensure site security.
Use of Security Equipment: Instruction on using security equipment, including radios, surveillance ​cameras, metal detectors, explosives detectors, handheld inspection tools, and tracking devices.
Customer and Public Interaction: Training on polite and effective interaction with the public and ​handling dangerous and emergency situations.
Report Writing: Training on collecting information, analyzing incidents, and writing accurate daily, ​weekly, and monthly security reports.
First Aid: Basic training on providing first aid in emergencies, such as wounds, fractures, and ​fainting.
Personal and Environmental Safety: Training on maintaining personal safety, identifying hazards ​(hazardous materials, flammable materials, electrical hazards, fires), and dealing with them.
Legal and Regulatory Procedures: Training on security-related laws and regulations, privacy ​protection, and correct application.
